purpose: Define the governance model, authority structure, and rule enforcement framework for WyneOS v1.0.

principles.transparency: All governance decisions traceable through logs and the decision matrix.
principles.consistency: Same rules applied across all system operations.
principles.integrity: No action permitted that compromises system integrity or sealed components.
principles.accountability: All rule changes and overrides must be authorised and logged.

decisionFramework.policyEngine: Evaluates actions against policy rules and governance feed.
decisionFramework.decisionMatrix: Determines allowed, restricted, or denied actions.
decisionFramework.overrideProtocol: Overrides only permitted through authorised governance channels.

changeControl.ruleChanges: Must be approved by the Governance and Integrity Team.
changeControl.engineUpdates: Any change to the governance engine requires a version review.
changeControl.auditRequirement: All governance changes recorded within the audit chain.

prohibited: Any action that compromises manifests or seals

summary.statement: The governance charter ensures that WyneOS operates under strict, consistent, and accountable governance control.
summary.notes: This charter applies to all future 1.x versions unless formally revised.
